p: Four main groups of oregano commonly used as culinary herbs can be distinguished, that is, Greek oregano ( Origanum vulgare L. ssp. hirtum (Link) Ietsw.), Spanish oregano ( Coridothymus capitatus (L.) Hoffmanns. & Link), Turkish oregano ( O. onites L.), and Mexican oregano ( Lippia graveolens Kunth) [ 35]. O. vulgare L. ssp. hirtum is a typical eastern Mediterranean taxon, reported only for some areas in Southern Italy [ 36]. The main single constituents of O. vulgare EO have been listed in Table 2.
